description: White sangria is the perfect&nbsp;summer drink, and this recipe makes it easy to enjoy all year long. This drink has a thirst-quenching blend of&nbsp;white wine (we recommend Albariño) and&nbsp;sparkling water, enough to make your mouth water.With fresh fruit like ripe peaches and green apple for added flavor along with other ingredients such as sugar, lemon, and mint leaves—you’ve got everything you need to make a delicious cocktail!
name: White Sangria
recipeIngredient: 1 bottle Albariño dry white wine, chilled
⅓ cup Brandy or Grand Marnier

recipeInstructions.name: Cut the peaches and apple into smaller pieces and put them in a large pitcher.
